NAME: Karishma Asrani
ABOUT:
Karishma is currently working as an Associate with Kotak Investment Banking. Previously she worked as an Investment Banking Analyst with HSBC, Strategic Transactions Group for the Oil & gas sector, covering the MENA region, for 21 months.

She pursued her MBA, majored in Finance, from NMIMS, Mumbai. She was the Seminars Head in the Student Council. She organised seminars and events with industry stalwarts, by leading a team of Student Council Representatives.

She is also a Certified Chartered Accountant.

She completed her Summer Internship (during MBA) with General Electric in the Financial Management Program with the Wipro GE Healthcare business.

Prior to MBA, she completed her CA Articleship of 3 years in Assurance, with PriceWaterhouseCoopers Pvt. Ltd. in 2014. She was a part of multiple Statutory Audits, Limited Reviews and Tax Audits for various listed and private clients.

She has completed her B.Com from H.R.College of Commerce & Economics, Mumbai.
